content: **men s knitted hat with rib sizes s/m l/xl the piece is worked in drops karisma ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no u-843 yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- sizes s/m l/xl fits head size approx 54/56 59/61 cm materials drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150 g colour 50 green the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm size 3 5 mm or the size needed to get 22 stitches and 30 row stocking stitch on 10 cm in width and 10 cm in height also 32 stitches and 30 row rib on 10 cm in width and 10 cm in height
